def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for x, y in get2idxs(idxs):
        check_xy_black = is_dark(x, ctx) and is_dark(y, ctx)
        check_x_above_y = is_above(x, y, ctx)
        check_x_smaller_y = is_smaller(x, y, ctx) and not same_size([x,y], ctx)
        if (
            check_xy_black
            and check_x_above_y
            and check_x_smaller_y
        ):
            results.append([x,y])
    return results
